relation: Great for these types of students
Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus
There's all kinds of hiking areas and a cool cave - if you don't mind getting a little dirty!

I've been fortunate to be raised around mission minded people. I've been to at least a dozen different countries on mission trips lasting from 2 wks to about 11 months! When I graduate from college I hope to devote a large part of my time to mission work!

I'm an officer in the cooking club! My friends and I love going hiking & camping and this summer I'm working at a youth camp where I am helping with adventure camp. We'll be repelling, white water rafting and caving to just name a few things.
Excellent food if you're a vegetarian! I love the food here - it's delicious and affordable!
Love it! Now I'm an RA in a campus condo! Everyone is great here.
You definitely need to study but that would be at any school! Whatever your goals are - go out there an get here!

Plug into resources! Attend your worship services! Attend your classes! Study hard and get your assignments done quickly. Take advantage of the extracurricular activiities - they're fun and you get to know lots of people! I took a year off to be a student missionary in Africa! What an incredible experience!

If you are looking for a small town college in a park-like setting; this is the place for you. Small class sizes lend to getting to know the students and the instructors! Emphasis on a personal relationship with Jesus is a plus for students who want to make Him a part of their life.

textAfterTable: Categories Comments Campus Safety They are called Veggie Cops What to do for fun Southern Adventist University, has many different places to explore. They have a forest preserve with different trails for a person to visit. They also have a baseball field, tennis courts, basketball courts, and a gymnasium to get the stress off of school. Food and Dining The food at Southern Adventist University is delicious, because there are multiple places on it's campus to eat. Dorm Life The Dorms are okay. There are not any co-ed dorms. However, there are different positive lessons that a person can learn in each individual dorm. Academic Rigor Southern Advenist University has a very strong Nursing program, as well as a business, art, medical, and social work program. Tips for prospective students Be open-minded Be willing to try new things Come with an open heart In three sentences Southern Adventist University is school for people who want to learn more about themselves as well as Christ. Southern Adventist University
